snippet: The State Senate on Friday approved giving local governments authority to keep out medical marijuana dispensaries until May 2015. The bill goes now to Gov. John Kitzhaber.
abstract: Oregon State Senate approves giving local governments authority to keep out medical marijuana dispensaries until May 2015.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate on Friday approved giving local governments authority to keep out medical marijuana dispensaries until May 2015. The bill goes now to Gov. John Kitzhaber.

headline.main: Oregon: Lawmakers Approve Bill to Let Cities Stay Marijuana-Free
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Lawmakers Approve Bill to Let Cities Stay Marijuana-Free
